title: Are iPads, laptops and tablets allowed in IITs to take notes in classrooms? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only an IITian or ex IITan can say that. I am not one. But Personally I think its not a very common thing in India even for most esteened institutions. Its kind of a culture that teachers prefer us to write on notebooks than type or write on IPad. I may be wrong as things have changed recently (I passed out 8 years back). Its not about allowed or not but how the profrssor reacts to it. Maybe things have or will be like that soon.
